column4: Loeb to quit board * Yahoo stock had surged more than 80 percent in last 12 months July 22 Yahoo Inc said on Monday that it had agreed to buy 40 million shares of its stock owned by Third Point LLC for $29.11 a share and that three directors nominated by Third Point have submitted their resignations.UPDATE 4-Third Point to sell most of Yahoo stake
